comment.author: 92284803@N00
comment._content: According to Wikipedia, "Anton Haus (June 13, 1851 – February 8, 1917) was an Austrian naval officer. Despite his German surname, he was born to a Slovenian-speaking family in Tolmein (now Tolmin, Slovenia). Haus was fleet commander of the Austro-Hungarian Navy in World War I and was the Navy's Grand Admiral from 1916 until his death."
